snippet: As the Federalists learned, opposing immigration is suicide.
abstract: Op-Ed article by journalist James Traub observes that Tea Party has taken up a crusade against allowing illegal immigrants to gain citizenship, which they say is giving amnesty to lawbreakers; urges Republicans to heed the example of the Federalists, whose opposition to immigration brought about their downfall.
lead_paragraph: As the Federalists learned, opposing immigration is suicide.

headline.main: The Tea Party’s Path to Irrelevance
headline.print_headline: The Tea Party’s Path to Irrelevance
